result.name: vacancy-tracking-data-and-commissioned-survey
result.notes: Database of head teacher, senior leader and middle leader vacancies and advertisements.  Also a commissioned report by EDS based on results of a survey conducted among schools advertising a head teacher or senior leadership vacancy which asks details about the vacancy and the appointed candidate.

organization.name: department-for-education
organization.title: Department for Education
organization.description:
The Department for Education is responsible for education and children’s services in England. We work to achieve a highly educated society in which opportunity is equal for children and young people, no matter what their background or family circumstances.
DfE is a ministerial department, supported by 9 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-education

result.title: Vacancy Tracking Data and Commissioned Survey

extras.value: Vactrac data accessed via a live database through a license agreement  currently 3 weeks delay due to data entry.  Commissioned report published on EDS website annually in January
